home.description: I’m a passionate developer with experience in web, AI, and mobile app development. Join my live coding sessions, where I build exciting projects in real-time! All projects will be available on GitHub under an open-source license, so you can explore, contribute, and use them freely.

about.title: About Me
about.description: With 12 years of experience in web, AI, and mobile development, I’m a passionate coder who loves sharing knowledge and helping others grow. Beyond coding, I’m an EDM enthusiast, an avid traveler exploring stunning destinations, and someone who thrives on meeting new people and exchanging ideas. Let’s connect, create, and innovate together!

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Here are some of my finished projects. Check out the source code on GitHub.

ideas.title: Project Ideas
ideas.description: Submit your ideas for the next project and vote for your favorites.
